feed.title: Michael Egle
feed.subtitle: Welcome to my website! This will host a bit of information about me and some of the projects I have worked on in the past.

entry.title: 2021 NFL Big Data Bowl
entry.content:
Every year the NFL hosts a sports analytics competition called the Big Data Bowl. It provides participants with the opportunity to work with NFL player and ball tracking data from past games, an extremely rare data set to get your hands on.

The 2021 theme was all about the defensive secondary in American football. My team looked at which defenders in the league had the lowest completion percentage relative to what weâ€™d expect based on factors such as distance to throw when they were the primary targeted defender.

For more information, you can read the full write up here
entry.summary: Every year the NFL hosts a sports analytics competition called the Big Data Bowl. It provides participants with the opportunity to work with NFL player and ball tracking data from past games, an extremely rare data set to get your hands on.
